text: This is a list of notable schools in the African country of Rwanda, organized by the provinces of Rwanda. == Kigali City == * Ecole Francaise Antoine de Saint Exupery (French School) * École Belge de Kigali Ecole Belge de Kigali (in French) * Hope Academy Rwanda Hope Academy Rwanda * International School of Kigali International School of Kigali * Kigali International Community School Kigali International Community School == Northern Province == * Groupe Scolaire Marie Reine Rwaza Groupe Scolaire Marie Reine Rwaza == Southern Province == * Ecole des Sciences Byimana * Groupe Scolaire Officiel de Butare (GSOB) ==See also== * Education in Rwanda * Lists of schools ==References== ==External links== *http://www.nur.ac.rw/rwanda5.htm *http://www.edorica.com/schools-location *http://www.NellyNelson.com Schools Schools Rwanda Rwanda Schools *
title: List of schools in Rwanda
